Module com.ifce.ppd.tsoroyematatu
Package com.ifce.ppd.tsoroyematatu

Interface RMIInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Server
public interface RMIInterface extends Remote
The client can execute a function on the server-side. Each function must send the client's info, used by the server to identify the player.

      Parameters:

      Throws:
